metadata.title: CVE-2020-13775 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: ZNC 1.8.0 up to 1.8.1-rc1 allows authenticated users to trigger anapplication crash (with a NULL pointer dereference) if echo-message is notenabled and there is no network.

criterions.comment: znc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
